channel.title: I need help with couple thing's
channel.description:
hello, im nechryael and i need help with some stuff on my server, when i try to add items to item.cfg, or add an autospawn, or npcs...
when i do make it, sometimes it says in compiler that its not in "client.class" but i dont know how to add in client.class, also sometimes it compiles the stuff i do but when i go to run server it says, starting "serversname" at port 43594 and it on but it says an error? so when people log in they do but then freeze and log out again? and it says username already logged in...
anyways some1 help me please? i will rep if helped

item.title: I need help with couple thing's
item.dc:creator: @nechryael nechryael
item.description:
@nechryael wrote:

hello, im nechryael and i need help with some stuff on my server, when i try to add items to item.cfg, or add an autospawn, or npcs…

when i do make it, sometimes it says in compiler that its not in “client.class” but i dont know how to add in client.class, also sometimes it compiles the stuff i do but when i go to run server it says, starting “serversname” at port 43594 and it on but it says an error? so when people log in they do but then freeze and log out again? and it says username already logged in…

anyways some1 help me please? i will rep if helped
